item.title: How to speed up X11 forwarding in SSH
item.description: vi ~/.ssh/config Host remote_host.com Compression yes ForwardX11 yes Ciphers blowfish-cbc,arcfour http://xmodulo.com/how-to-speed-up-x11-forwarding-in-ssh.html
